item.title: Everything We As Developers Should Know About Caffeine: Benefits, Risks and How We Can Use It Wisely
item.description:
Everything We As Developers Should Know About Caffeine: Benefits, Risks and How We Can Use It Wisely

Caffeine plays a central role in the daily routines of many software developers, powering late night coding sessions and delivering that essential boost for early morning productivity. But how exactly does caffeine work? What are the benefits and risks? And how can we as developers manage our caffeine intake to optimize focus without falling into dependency? Letâ€™s dive into everything you need to know about caffeine.
